snippet: Simon Cowell is pressing the reset button on his show, firing the judges Paula Abdul and Nicole Scherzinger, as well as the show’s host, Steve Jones.
abstract: Producer Simon Cowell removes judges Paula Abdul and Nicole Scherzinger and host Steve Jones from his singing competition show The X Factor.
lead_paragraph: Simon Cowell is pressing the reset button on his show, firing the judges Paula Abdul and Nicole Scherzinger, as well as the show’s host, Steve Jones.

headline.seo: Two Judges Get Axed From ‘X Factor’
headline.main: On ‘X Factor,’ 2 Judges and Host Get the Ax
headline.print_headline: On ‘X Factor,’ 2 Judges and Host Get the Ax
